name: The Last Elephant
description:
Game made for the Global Game Jam in 2017. 

The Last Elephant is a twin-stick, isometric shooter game which the player assumes the role of Asha, a female elephant who is one of the last of her species and last of the elephant family on Earth. Asha, having been pitied by the gods for her valiant struggle, has been blessed by the god Ganesha and granted the powers of controlling light, sound, and water. Asha must use these three abilities in order to fend off the aliens known as the block men, who seek to capture and eventually kill Asha in order to attain the higher form known as anti-aliasing. Your objective is to live as long as possible in order to please Ganesha and achieve greatness. This game is played with a controller and was developed with Xbox One controller in mind.

Developers:

Jonathan Saavedra - Programmer/Game Designer

Noel Biscocho - Programmer/Game Designer

Avineesh Kompella - Programmer/Game Designer

Roger Dalke - Programmer/Art

Johnny Nguyen - Programmer/Sound

Alex Bagg - Programmer/Game Designer

Jason Shuieh - Producer/Writer

For more information visit our Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/last-elephant
